name: Molehill Mayhem
description:
Mr. Grouch has gone away, and it's time for Bubble's to play!

There's dog treats, dandelions, and cupcakes to be eaten. And there's lollipops, worms (eek!), bonuses and more!

But, it's not all fun. Those pesky moles are up to their naughty tricks again! Just avoid the molehills trying to sink Bubbles and it will all be fine. Well, and dodge the earth mines that Daryl the naughty mole is throwing.

Play with Bubbles the dog in this casual and fast paced collect 'em up game. How many levels can you complete? And just how many dog treats can a single dog eat? Unlimited, apparently!

Features:
- Endless collect 'em up
- Cupcakes!
- High scores, groovy music, bonuses, infinite levels and more
- No ads, no in-app purchases, and no tracking!

And if you want to see more of Bubbles, check out the other Mr. Grouch games, including: Lawn Invasion and Clean Sweep.
